<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We must reference the passes in such a way that compilers will not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// delete it all as dead code, even with whole program optimization,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// yet is effectively a NO-OP. As the compiler isn&#39;t smart enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to know that getenv() never returns -1, this will do the job.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is so that globals in the translation units where these functions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are defined are forced to be initialized, populating various</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
